reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and perfect for weddings, with a satin fabric that feels high-quality on the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, elegant dress for wedding party-
items.body: Truly a surprise that I could find an affordable dress for a wedding on Amazon- one that I liked and didn't have to alter! Great color, soft fabric, and true to size- also very comfortable and lined. Zipper is hidden in the armpit! Read more
items.author: Lea Sarnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Satin Dress ‚Äì Perfect for Weddings and Special Occasions!
items.body: I love this dress! I'm 5'3'', 120 pound. The small fits me perfectly. I recently purchased this elegant satin dress, and it exceeded my expectations! The material is silky smooth, lightweight, and incredibly comfortable to wear. Though it‚Äôs non-stretch, the fabric has a beautiful sheen and feels high-quality on the skin. I love the thoughtful design ‚Äî the pleated bust with a flattering cowl neck adds a touch of sophistication, and the adjustable spaghetti straps help create a perfect fit. The hidden side zipper makes it easy to put on, and the stretchy back panel adds a bit of give where needed. Be aware: the sizing runs small, so if you‚Äôre between sizes, definitely size up. I followed that advice and got a flawless fit! This dress is ideal for wedding guests, cocktail parties, or any semi-formal event. I paired it with heels and simple jewelry, and got so many compliments. It‚Äôs classy, stylish, and makes a graceful statement without being over-the-top. Highly recommend for anyone looking for an elegant and flattering satin dress! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress
items.body: I bought this dress believing there was no way it was going to work for me, but boy was I wrong! I think this has to be one of the best dresses I‚Äôve ever purchased on Amazon. I wore it for a June wedding guest dress and got so many compliments. The yellow is giving How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days. The fit was amazing. I got the XXL. I‚Äôm 6‚Äô7‚Äù, around 225lbs, 47.5 Bust, 38.5 Waist, and 47.5 Hips - true hour glass - and this baby skimmed every curve! I wore a minimizing strapless bar for the first part of the evening and ditched it and went braless for dancing. Couldn‚Äôt even notice. My mother in law is a seamstress and was astonished by the style, fit, and quality of this dress. The lining as perfect too! If you‚Äôre on the fence, go for it. It‚Äôs going to be so hard for me not to buy this in every color for the other weddings I have coming up this year. Might have to just to have them on hand!! Read more
items.author: misstinacarr

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's really cute, but seams can be lumpy (read on)
items.body: I have smaller boobs (36/38 B/C) & am 5'5" 164lbs It's really cute and although the neck/chest area is slouched, it doesn't become inappropriate and expose too much when you bend down. I wear a M/L, but I ordered a M for the sake of time (L would've taken longer to get to me) and for it to be fitted. It does fit a bit snug on me, but I can still breathe and move. No matter what size, you couldn't run in this dress unless you lift it over your thighs. üòÇ I took away 1 star because, although it has a liner, it seems to be sewn inside out or the edges/seams are too thick so you don't have a smooth appearance on your sides. It makes my hips look a little lumpy. As long as no one stares at your there, it's fine. I wish it didn't have that, but I still love the dress. The rusted/brown orange color is very beautiful. Please fix the seams! If you do, I'd love to exchange or even buy another one in more colors! Read more
items.author: Kat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy
items.body: I LOVE THIS DRESS! The material was of great quality. I wore it to a wedding and people kept giving me so many compliments on it. The color in the pic looks like a brown and the name on the pic is "Ac Brown" but it is most definitely burnt orange 100% but i am not mad, it looked great. I bought a large my chest is a little bigger so it was hard to zip up but after fighting it to zip it felt perfect. i am 5'4 140lbs Read more
items.author: Karina

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Corte en la tela de la falda
items.body: La falda estaba un poco rota por la parte de adelante. Read more
items.author: Ivanna Vera Santos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LUNAMODA women‚Äôs summer satin dress
items.body: I purchased this dress for a wedding, and it was exactly what I was looking for. The color of the dress was exactly as it appeared in the online image. The fabric has a nice satin feel, and is weighty enough it didn‚Äôt cling or feel see through. I purchased two sizes, and the smaller size fit perfectly, but the larger size was just a bit longer and what I needed, so I went with it. I was able to compensate by adjusting the straps. I would absolutely purchase again, and will wear this again in the future. Read more
items.author: chris cork

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low cut
items.body: Liked the length and material of the dress (I‚Äôm 4‚Äô11). However it showed too much cleavage for my liking. I kept having to pull it up. I ended up wearing a different dress for the event. Read more
items.author: Nancy a reyes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A_a Green, Ac Navy Blue, Black Floral, Floral Pink, Ac Dusty Beige, Ac Champagne Black Polkdot, Ac Champagne, Ac Navy Blue White Polkdot, A_a Yellow, Beige Floral, Ab Baked Rose, Ac Lake Blue, Ac Pale Blue, Floral Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
